We raised over $50,000 for The Solutions Project from 
our Donate the Change programWe want all Americans to have the opportunity to invest in renewable energy, which is why we oﬀer our customers a 
unique and special line of credit to install solar panels on their own homes. Through this oﬀering, we are embracing smart infrastructure development that doesn’t leave a toxic imprint on our environment and creates opportunities for workers with a critical skillset.
Other impact areas in 2018: 
Green banking
We purchased $45 million in residential Property 
Assessed Clean Energy ﬁnancing, helping over 2,000 homeowners become more energy eﬃcient and reduce greenhouse gases
We committed $35 million to help 4,000 Connecticut 
businesses and municipalities become more energy eﬃcient
We saved 73,498 metric tons of greenhouse gas 
emissions by lending to solar companies•
